Name: Karikari
Notes: A small enemy that will chase after the player if they get too close. It will try to stick to the player's body to damage them. The player can get rid of them by using a Spin Attack. It can be defeated using most of the player's attacks. If shot by a Star Bit, it will drop three Star Bits instead of one. It can also be defeated by an enemy's explosion crush attack.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted, frozen and defeated by player 2.
